titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Artemisia Gentileschi Letter to Cassiano Dal Pozzo, 1630 August 31 RL.11053
titlestmt.author: Alice L. Poffinberger

publicationstmt.publisher: David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2017-07-05 12:04:27 -0400.

repository.corpname: David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library

did.unittitle: Artemisia Gentileschi letter to Cassiano Dal Pozzo
did.abstract: Collection comprises a signed letter (2 leaves; 20 cm x 27 cm) from Artemisia Gentileschi to patron Cassiano Dal Pozzo, written from Naples 1630 August 31. She requests his help in acquiring a license for her assistant, Diego Campanili, to carry arms, and mentions work she is completing for the Empress and a portrait she is painting for Dal Pozzo.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Artemisia Gentileschi was a highly regarded painter and proponent of Caravaggio's dramatic realism. She was born in Rome in 1593 and died in Naples in 1652 or 1653.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: Researchers must register and agree to copyright and privacy laws before using this collection.
All or portions of this collection may be housed off-site in Duke University's Library Service Center. The library may require up to 48 hours to retrieve these materials for research use.
Please contact Research Services staff before visiting the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library to use this collection.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: The copyright interests in this collection have not been transferred to Duke University. For more information, consult the copyright section of the Regulations and Procedures of the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library.

acqinfo.head: Provenance
acqinfo.p: The Artemisia Gentileschi Letter to Cassiano Dal Pozzo, 1630 August 31, was received by the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library as a gift in 2017.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Artemisia Gentileschi Letter to Cassiano Dal Pozzo, 1630 August 31, David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library, Duke University.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Processed by Alice L. Poffinberger, May 2015.
Accessions described in this collection guide: 2015-0050-LUBMSS220.

scopecontent.head: Collection Overview
scopecontent.p: Collection comprises a signed letter (2 leaves; 20 cm x 27 cm) from Artemisia Gentileschi to patron Cassiano Dal Pozzo, written from Naples 1630 August 31. She requests his help in acquiring a license for her assistant, Diego Campanili, to carry arms, and mentions work she is completing for the Empress and a portrait she is painting for Dal Pozzo.
